localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: A time tracking app focused on life itself rather than projects, tasks, and more specific types. It helps to generalize a day and make it easier to document your life. It just takes 5 seconds to log your day. You don't have to remember each minute.
blogPost.body: A time tracking app focused on life itself rather than projects, tasks, and more specific types. It helps to generalize a day and make it easier to document your life. It just takes 5 seconds to log your day. You don't have to remember each minute.
blogPost.title: Horae - Measure your life, log your hours and document your life
blogPost.author: Jim Raptis

localize.description: 一款专注于生活本身的时间追踪应用，而不是项目、任务和更具体的类型。它有助于概括一天的生活，让你更容易记录生活。它只需要5秒钟就可以记录你的一天。你不必记住每一分钟。
localize.tagline: 衡量你的生活，记录你的时间，记录你的生活。

localize.description: 一款專注於生活本身的時間追蹤應用，而不是項目、任務和更具體的類型。它有助於概括一天的生活，讓你更容易記錄生活。它只需要5秒鐘就可以記錄你的一天。你不必記住每一分鐘。
localize.tagline: 衡量你的生活，記錄你的時間，記錄你的生活。

previous.excerpt: With hydesk, we want to allow people to be more flexible within their workspace. You can use it while sitting to have the perfect viewing height for any screen or just standing up to boost your creativity and well-being.
previous.title: hydesk - A fully foldable and sustainable stand-up desk

localize.description: 通过hydesk，我们希望让人们在工作空间中更加灵活。您可以在坐着的时候使用它，为任何屏幕提供完美的观看高度，也可以站着使用，以提高您的创造力和幸福感。
localize.tagline: 一张可折叠、可持续发展的站立式办公桌

localize.description: 通過hydesk，我們希望讓人們在工作空間中更加靈活。您可以在坐着的時候使用它，爲任何屏幕提供完美的觀看高度，也可以站着使用，以提高您的創造力和幸福感。
localize.tagline: 一張可摺疊、可持續發展的站立式辦公桌
